item.title: Computers and Code
item.description: Lesson Overview A practical lesson as an introduction to learning Python. (One Hour) Objectives Understand what computers are for Understand how we can control computers Learn how to instruct a computer using Python “Hello World!!” (standard) Loops to output many times (intermediate) Strings and manipulation (advanced) ___ Outcomes All: will know that code tells a computer to do work

item.title: Computer Science - KS3

item.title: Introduction to Computers and Programming
item.description: An intro to programming echo "hello world!!" ls -la /home/avastmick ## Lesson Overview A practical lesson as an introduction to learning Python. (One Hour) ___ ## Objectives - Understand what computers are for - Understand how we can control computers - Learn how to instruct a computer using **Python** + "Hello World!!" (standard) + Loops to output many times (intermediate) + Strings and manipulation (advanced) ___ ## Outcomes - **All:** + will know that code tells a computer to do work + and know what syntax is - **Most:** + will know how to write simple "
